content: Luckily, they don't have much health and are easily dodged -- but note that the Frozen Corpses with spiked maces will swing wildly a few times after they've been "killed" so street clear of their death throes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path'.
The content is as follows:
Luckily, they don't have much health and are easily dodged -- but note that the Frozen Corpses with spiked maces will swing wildly a few times after they've been "killed" so street clear of their death throes.
